snippet: COHEN--Kenneth Conrad, 81, died in Atlanta April 1. Devoted husband to Dede, loving father to Jeffery and Julie and Mark and Holly, beloved brother to Susan, Morey, and Larry, dedicated grandfather to Benjamin, Lauren, Douglas, and Charlie; predeceased by parents, Dolly and Arthur. Grew up in Manhattan. A sports and theater lover, lead a dynamic life that spanned acting, art, writing, and sales. Donations: Lung Cancer Research Foundation. www. JewishFuneralCare.com 1/3

Grew up in Manhattan. A sports and theater lover, lead a dynamic life that spanned acting, art, writing, and sales. Donations: Lung Cancer Research Foundation. www. JewishFuneralCare.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  COHEN, KENNETH CONRAD
